document_data.caption: A map showing the Dragon's Head on the Street of Silks.
document_data.name: Dragon's Head
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon's Head''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Dragon's Head was located in the far southwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] across from [[Ahghairon's Tower]] where [[Waterdeep Way]] and the [[Street of Silks]] joined. The rear of the tavern sat on both [[Cage Street]] and [[Shadow Alley]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5271}}
